labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Divide and Conquer Server" is designed to break down complex tasks into structured, manageable parts using a JSON format. It allows for detailed tracking, context maintenance, and organization of tasks across multiple conversations. The available tools focus on task management, checklist operations, context updates, and resource tracking, making it a powerful tool for organizing and completing intricate workflows.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Task Management" (categorized under Daily Productivity) was chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around organizing and managing tasks, track progress, and maintain context. Secondary labels "Memory Management" and "Organization Tools" were added because the server also helps in storing context and maintaining structured notes and resources, which are key aspects of knowledge management and organization.

tools.name: initialize_task
tools.description: Creates a new task with the specified description and optional initial checklist items.

task_description.description: A medium-level detailed description about the whole task

context_for_all_tasks.description: Information that all tasks in the checklist should include

task.description: A short yet comprehensive name for the task

detailed_description.description: A longer description about what we want to achieve with this task

context_and_plan.description: Related information, files the agent should read, and more details from other tasks, as well as a detailed plan for this task

done.description: Whether the task is already completed

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated completion time (ISO timestamp or duration)

tools.name: update_task_description
tools.description: Updates the main task description.

tools.name: update_context
tools.description: Updates the context information for all tasks.

context_for_all_tasks.description: The new context information for all tasks

tools.name: add_checklist_item
tools.description: Adds a new item to the checklist.

task.description: A short yet comprehensive name for the task

detailed_description.description: A longer description about what we want to achieve with this task

context_and_plan.description: Related information, files the agent should read, and more details from other tasks, as well as a detailed plan for this task

done.description: Whether the task is already completed

position.description: Optional position to insert the task (0-based index). If not provided, the task will be added at the end.

tools.name: update_checklist_item
tools.description: Updates an existing checklist item.

index.description: The index of the checklist item to update (0-based)

task.description: A short yet comprehensive name for the task

detailed_description.description: A longer description about what we want to achieve with this task

context_and_plan.description: Related information, files the agent should read, and more details from other tasks, as well as a detailed plan for this task

tools.name: mark_task_done
tools.description: Marks a checklist item as done.

index.description: The index of the checklist item to mark as done (0-based)

tools.name: mark_task_undone
tools.description: Marks a checklist item as not done.

index.description: The index of the checklist item to mark as not done (0-based)

tools.name: remove_checklist_item
tools.description: Removes a checklist item.

index.description: The index of the checklist item to remove (0-based)

tools.name: reorder_checklist_item
tools.description: Moves a checklist item to a new position.

from_index.description: The current index of the checklist item (0-based)

to_index.description: The new index for the checklist item (0-based)

tools.name: add_note
tools.description: Adds a note to the task.

tools.name: add_resource
tools.description: Adds a resource to the task.

url.description: URL or file path of the resource

tools.name: update_metadata
tools.description: Updates the task metadata.

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated completion time (ISO timestamp or duration)

tools.name: clear_task
tools.description: Clears the current task data.

tools.name: get_checklist_summary
tools.description: Returns a summary of the checklist with completion status.

include_descriptions.description: Whether to include detailed descriptions in the summary

tools.name: get_current_task_details
tools.description: Retrieves details of the current task (first uncompleted task) with full context. This is the recommended tool to use when working with tasks.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@landicefu/divide-and-conquer-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
